text: He grows on you, doesn't he?
Tromboner, give me what you've got.
Or I will break your face.
What the fuck did you come as, Tromboner? A girl?
I'm going to fucking kill you.
Are you going to do it now or later?
Because I'm ready when you are.
If you ever tell anyone about this,
I don't know what you're talking about.
Do you want to see something cool?
I know you hate it at home,
but I'm kind of glad you're back.
For years, Eric. He's a horrible person!
then why is he making you sneak around at night?
You stopped coming to the window.
You bullied me for years, Adam.
You made me feel unsafe for years.
You were one of the main reasons
You can't even hold my hand.
I feel like everyone hates me.
It's kind of hard to like someone
Eric Effiong, I have something to say to you.
I want to hold your hand.
Go and take a look at yourself in the mirror.
Right now, Adam. Go and take a look in the mirror.
You're going to ruin my makeup.
Would you like to stay for dinner?
This is the bit where you're supposed to be happy.
But are you sure Adam isn't going to mess you around?
I think he's still not comfortable with himself
and I don't want you to get hurt.
I want you to be my best friend
I think I'm a bit scared.
No, no. I do. I really do.
I'm worried that I don't know what I'm doing.
Don't worry! I douched before school.
don't want to have sex with me?
I want to tell you how I feel.
But I don't want you to look at me.
don't want to have sex with you.
I don't understand what you're saying, Adam.
I want you to put your dick in me.
That's how I would like to do it.
I would love to put my dick in you.
I think I'm starting to get the whole Adam thing.
He grows on you, doesn't he?
The guy that I'm dating at the moment.
Lovely to see you again, Maureen.
I think it will be good for us to get some space
So you want to get away from me?
No. You just said that you want to get away from me.
How am I supposed to feel?
I don't want us to have space.
I have to tell you something.
It just happened. I'm so sorry. I don't…
I need to go and feed Madam.
I told Adam. I think we might be over.
I wanted to tell you too, but I just…
I was so ashamed and I didn't know how to.
-Do you want it to be over? -I don't know.
I feel like a bad person.
I don't even know why I did it.
It just made me feel free.
we could pretend it didn't happen.
I can be ok with it.
It was a stupid kiss and it didn't mean anything.
I don't think it was just a stupid kiss, Adam.
I feel bad I hurt you.
But you wouldn't take it back?
No, I don't think I would.
And it feels hard with me.
I just feel like I'm ready to fly
and you're just learning to walk.
And I've worked really hard to find myself
and I'm beginning to lose who I am.
A boy I don't like told me to write from the heart.
I didn't know what that meant
because I never knew I had one.
I never knew I had a heart
until you said you kissed a boy I haven't met.
Then I knew I had a heart
because I thought it might stop.
And, when I thought my heart might stop beating,
I realised that it had always been there.
But it didn't know how to feel.
Until I thought about losing you.
I knew we wouldn't last forever
and I was waiting for this day.
But I hope we can fix things
for showing me I have a heart.
